Reddy"', 'Acharya_Institute_of_Technology | country | "India"']

final_response: The Acharya Institute of Technology is located in Soldevanahalli, on Acharya Dr. Sarvapalli Radhakrishnan Road, Hessarghatta Main Road, Bangalore – 560090, in India. The president of the institute is B.M. Reddy, and it is affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University.
